1: וְ֠נַעֲמָן <sup>5283 </sup> <n>Now Naaman</n> שַׂר־ <sup>8269 </sup> <n>captain</n> צְבָ֨א <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of the host</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>of the king</n> אֲרָ֜ם <sup>758 </sup> <n>of Syria</n> הָיָ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> אִישׁ֩ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> גָּד֨וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>was a great</n> לִפְנֵ֤י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>with</n> אֲדֹנָיו֙ <sup>113 </sup> <n>his master</n> וּנְשֻׂ֣א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>and honourable</n> פָנִ֔ים <sup>6440 </sup> <n>accept</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> ב֛וֹ נָֽתַן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>had given</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>because by him the LORD</n> תְּשׁוּעָ֖ה <sup>8668 </sup> <n>deliverance</n> לַאֲרָ֑ם <sup>758 </sup> <n>unto Syria</n> וְהָאִ֗ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> הָיָ֛ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> גִּבּ֥וֹר <sup>1368 </sup> <n>he was also a mighty</n> חַ֖יִל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>in valour</n> מְצֹרָֽע׃ <sup>6879 </sup> <n>[but he was] a leper</n>
2: וַאֲרָם֙ <sup>758 </sup> <n>And the Syrians</n> יָצְא֣וּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>had gone out</n> גְדוּדִ֔ים <sup>1416 </sup> <n>by companies</n> וַיִּשְׁבּ֛וּ <sup>7617 </sup> <n>and had brought away captive</n> מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the land</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> נַעֲרָ֣ה <sup>5291 </sup> <n>maid</n> קְטַנָּ֑ה <sup>6996 </sup> <n>a little</n> וַתְּהִ֕י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>waited</n> לִפְנֵ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>and she waited on</n> אֵ֥שֶׁת <sup>802 </sup> <n>wife</n> נַעֲמָֽן׃ <sup>5283 </sup> <n>Naaman's</n>
3: וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And she said</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to her</n> גְּבִרְתָּ֔הּ <sup>1404 </sup> <n>unto her mistress</n> אַחֲלֵ֣י <sup>305 </sup> <n>Would</n> אֲדֹנִ֔י <sup>113 </sup> <n>God my lord</n> לִפְנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>[were] with</n> הַנָּבִ֖יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>the prophet</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בְּשֹׁמְר֑וֹן <sup>8111 </sup> <n>that [is] in Samaria</n> אָ֛ז <sup>227 </sup> <n>for</n> יֶאֱסֹ֥ף <sup>622 </sup> <n>he would recover</n> אֹת֖וֹ <sup>853 </sup> מִצָּרַעְתּֽוֹ׃ <sup>6883 </sup> <n>him of his leprosy</n>
4: וַיָּבֹ֕א <sup>935 </sup> <n>And [one] went in</n> וַיַּגֵּ֥ד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>and told</n> לַאדֹנָ֖יו <sup>113 </sup> <n>his lord</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> כָּזֹ֤את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> וְכָזֹאת֙ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> דִּבְּרָ֣ה <sup>1696 </sup> <n>Thus and thus said</n> הַֽנַּעֲרָ֔ה <sup>5291 </sup> <n>the maid</n> אֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>that [is] of the land</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
5: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>And the king</n> אֲרָם֙ <sup>758 </sup> <n>of Syria</n> לֶךְ־ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Go</n> בֹּ֔א <sup>935 </sup> <n>go</n> וְאֶשְׁלְחָ֥ה <sup>7971 </sup> <n>and I will send</n> סֵ֖פֶר <sup>5612 </sup> <n>a letter</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>unto the king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וַיֵּלֶךְ֩ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>departed</n> וַיִּקַּ֨ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and took</n> בְּיָד֜וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>with him</n> עֶ֣שֶׂר <sup>6235 </sup> <n>ten</n> כִּכְּרֵי־ <sup>3603 </sup> <n>talents</n> כֶ֗סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>of silver</n> וְשֵׁ֤שֶׁת <sup>8337 </sup> <n>and six</n> אֲלָפִים֙ <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> זָהָ֔ב <sup>2091 </sup> <n>[pieces] of gold</n> וְעֶ֖שֶׂר <sup>6235 </sup> <n>and ten</n> חֲלִיפ֥וֹת <sup>2487 </sup> <n>changes</n> בְּגָדִֽים׃ <sup>899 </sup> <n>of raiment</n>
6: וַיָּבֵ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>And he brought</n> הַסֵּ֔פֶר <sup>5612 </sup> <n>the letter</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מֶ֥לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>to the king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> וְעַתָּ֗ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>and now</n> כְּב֨וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>is come</n> הַסֵּ֤פֶר <sup>5612 </sup> <n>Now when this letter</n> הַזֶּה֙ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> אֵלֶ֔יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to you</n> הִנֵּ֨ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> שָׁלַ֤חְתִּי <sup>7971 </sup> <n>unto thee behold I have [therewith] sent</n> אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַעֲמָ֣ן <sup>5283 </sup> <n>Naaman</n> עַבְדִּ֔י <sup>5650 </sup> <n>my servant</n> וַאֲסַפְתּ֖וֹ <sup>622 </sup> <n>to thee that thou mayest recover</n> מִצָּרַעְתּֽוֹ׃ <sup>6883 </sup> <n>him of his leprosy</n>
7: וַיְהִ֡י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כִּקְרֹא֩ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>had read</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when the king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַסֵּ֜פֶר <sup>5612 </sup> <n>the letter</n> וַיִּקְרַ֣ע <sup>7167 </sup> <n>that he rent</n> בְּגָדָ֗יו <sup>899 </sup> <n>his clothes</n> וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> הַאֱלֹהִ֥ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>[Am] I God</n> אָ֙נִי֙ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> לְהָמִ֣ית <sup>4191 </sup> <n>to kill</n> וּֽלְהַחֲי֔וֹת <sup>2421 </sup> <n>and to make alive</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>how</n> זֶה֙ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>that this man</n> שֹׁלֵ֣חַ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>doth send</n> אֵלַ֔י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> לֶאֱסֹ֥ף <sup>622 </sup> <n>unto me to recover</n> אִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>a man</n> מִצָּֽרַעְתּ֑וֹ <sup>6883 </sup> <n>leprosy</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>how</n> אַךְ־ <sup>389 </sup> <n>also</n> דְּעֽוּ־ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>consider</n> נָא֙ <sup>4994 </sup> <n>now</n> וּרְא֔וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>I pray you and see</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>how</n> מִתְאַנֶּ֥ה <sup>579 </sup> <n>how he seeketh a quarrel</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לִֽי׃
8: וַיְהִ֞י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>happened</n> כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ ׀ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>had heard</n> אֱלִישָׁ֣ע <sup>477 </sup> <n>And it was [so] when Elisha</n> אִישׁ־ <sup>376 </sup> <n>the man</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> קָרַ֤ע <sup>7167 </sup> <n>had rent</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>that the king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּגָדָ֔יו <sup>899 </sup> <n>his clothes</n> וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>that he sent</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>to the king</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> לָ֥מָּה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>Why</n> קָרַ֖עְתָּ <sup>7167 </sup> <n>Wherefore hast thou rent</n> בְּגָדֶ֑יךָ <sup>899 </sup> <n>his clothes</n> יָבֹֽא־ <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> נָ֣א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>I beseech thee</n> אֵלַ֔י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> וְיֵדַ֕ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>now to me and he shall know</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> יֵ֥שׁ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>that there is</n> נָבִ֖יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>a prophet</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>in Israel</n>
9: וַיָּבֹ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> נַעֲמָ֖ן <sup>5283 </sup> <n>So Naaman</n> [בְּסוּסֹו כ] (בְּסוּסָ֣יו <sup>5483 </sup> <n>crane</n> ק) וּבְרִכְבּ֑וֹ <sup>7393 </sup> <n>and with his chariot</n> וַיַּעֲמֹ֥ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>and stood</n> פֶּֽתַח־ <sup>6607 </sup> <n>at the door</n> הַבַּ֖יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> לֶאֱלִישָֽׁע׃ <sup>477 </sup> <n>of Elisha</n>
10: וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>sent</n> אֵלָ֛יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אֱלִישָׁ֖ע <sup>477 </sup> <n>And Elisha</n> מַלְאָ֣ךְ <sup>4397 </sup> <n>a messenger</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto him saying</n> הָל֗וֹךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Go</n> וְרָחַצְתָּ֤ <sup>7364 </sup> <n>and wash</n> שֶֽׁבַע־ <sup>7651 </sup> <n>seven</n> פְּעָמִים֙ <sup>6471 </sup> <n>times</n> בַּיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <sup>3383 </sup> <n>in Jordan</n> וְיָשֹׁ֧ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>shall come again</n> בְּשָׂרְךָ֛ <sup>1320 </sup> <n>and thy flesh</n> לְךָ֖ וּטְהָֽר׃ <sup>2891 </sup> <n>to thee and thou shalt be clean</n>
11: וַיִּקְצֹ֥ף <sup>7107 </sup> <n>was wroth</n> נַעֲמָ֖ן <sup>5283 </sup> <n>But Naaman</n> וַיֵּלַ֑ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and went</n> וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> הִנֵּ֨ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> אָמַ֜רְתִּי <sup>559 </sup> <n>Behold I thought</n> אֵלַ֣י ׀ <sup>413 </sup> <n>over</n> יֵצֵ֣א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>He will surely</n> יָצ֗וֹא <sup>3318 </sup> <n>come out</n> וְעָמַד֙ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>to me and stand</n> וְקָרָא֙ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and call</n> בְּשֵׁם־ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>on the name</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֱלֹהָ֔יו <sup>430 </sup> <n>his God</n> וְהֵנִ֥יף <sup>5130 </sup> <n>and strike</n> יָד֛וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>his hand</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>over</n> הַמָּק֖וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>over the place</n> וְאָסַ֥ף <sup>622 </sup> <n>and recover</n> הַמְּצֹרָֽע׃ <sup>6879 </sup> <n>the leper</n>
12: הֲלֹ֡א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> טוֹב֩ <sup>2896 </sup> <n>better</n> [אֲבָנָה כ] (אֲמָנָ֨ה <sup>71 </sup> <n>Abana</n> ק) וּפַרְפַּ֜ר <sup>6554 </sup> <n>and Pharpar</n> נַהֲר֣וֹת <sup>5104 </sup> <n>rivers</n> דַּמֶּ֗שֶׂק <sup>1834 </sup> <n>of Damascus</n> מִכֹּל֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מֵימֵ֣י <sup>4325 </sup> <n>than all the waters</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> הֲלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אֶרְחַ֥ץ <sup>7364 </sup> <n>bathe</n> בָּהֶ֖ם וְטָהָ֑רְתִּי <sup>2891 </sup> <n>in them and be clean</n> וַיִּ֖פֶן <sup>6437 </sup> <n>? So he turned</n> וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and went</n> בְּחֵמָֽה׃ <sup>2534 </sup> <n>in a rage</n>
13: וַיִּגְּשׁ֣וּ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>came near</n> עֲבָדָיו֮ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>And his servants</n> וַיְדַבְּר֣וּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and spake</n> אֵלָיו֒ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto him and said</n> אָבִי֙ <sup>1 </sup> <n>My father</n> דָּבָ֣ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>thing</n> גָּד֗וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>thee [do some] great</n> הַנָּבִ֛יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>[if] the prophet</n> דִּבֶּ֥ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>had bid</n> אֵלֶ֖יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הֲל֣וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>wouldest thou not have done</n> וְאַ֛ף <sup>637 </sup> <n>[it]? how much rather then</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> אָמַ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>when he saith</n> אֵלֶ֖יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to you</n> רְחַ֥ץ <sup>7364 </sup> <n>to thee Wash</n> וּטְהָֽר׃ <sup>2891 </sup> <n>and be clean</n>
14: וַיֵּ֗רֶד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>Then went he down</n> וַיִּטְבֹּ֤ל <sup>2881 </sup> <n>and dipped</n> בַּיַּרְדֵּן֙ <sup>3383 </sup> <n>in Jordan</n> שֶׁ֣בַע <sup>7651 </sup> <n>himself seven</n> פְּעָמִ֔ים <sup>6471 </sup> <n>times</n> כִּדְבַ֖ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>according to the saying</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>of the man</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> וַיָּ֣שָׁב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>came again</n> בְּשָׂר֗וֹ <sup>1320 </sup> <n>and his flesh</n> כִּבְשַׂ֛ר <sup>1320 </sup> <n>like unto the flesh</n> נַ֥עַר <sup>5288 </sup> <n>child</n> קָטֹ֖ן <sup>6996 </sup> <n>of a little</n> וַיִּטְהָֽר׃ <sup>2891 </sup> <n>and he was clean</n>
15: וַיָּשָׁב֩ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>And he returned</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אִ֨ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>to the man</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֜ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וְכָֽל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מַחֲנֵ֗הוּ <sup>4264 </sup> <n>he and all his company</n> וַיָּבֹא֮ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and came</n> וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>and stood</n> לְפָנָיו֒ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>him and he said</n> הִנֵּה־ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> נָ֤א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>now</n> יָדַ֙עְתִּי֙ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>Behold now I know</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֵ֤ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> אֱלֹהִים֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>that [there is] no God</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in all the earth</n> כִּ֖י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>but</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>but in Israel</n> וְעַתָּ֛ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> קַח־ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>now therefore I pray thee take</n> נָ֥א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>please</n> בְרָכָ֖ה <sup>1293 </sup> <n>a blessing</n> מֵאֵ֥ת <sup>853 </sup> עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>of thy servant</n>
